Replace.Text: 东印度公司
埃莉诺的城市中每个巨作可使9个单元格内的外国城市每回合减少2点忠诚度。城市因失去忠诚度而离开另一文明后，如其每回合对埃莉诺的忠诚度最高，则会跳过成为自由城市阶段直接加入埃莉诺的文明。

Great Works in Eleanor’s cities each cause -2 Loyalty per turn in foreign cities within 9 tiles. A city that leaves another civilization due to a loss of Loyalty and is currently receiving the most Loyalty per turn from Eleanor's civilization skips the Free City step to join this civilization.

所有陆地单位无视森林和雨林对 [ICON_MOVEMENT] 移动力的减益。除了通常的 [ICON_Culture] 文化值，还会从每个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物、[ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物以及 [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture]雕塑艺术巨作中获得+2 [ICON_Food] 食物、+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力、+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币和+1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。获得额外100% [ICON_GreatWriter] 大作家、[ICON_GreatArtist] 大艺术家、[ICON_GreatMusician] 大音乐家和 [ICON_GreatMerchant] 大商人点数。宫殿有5个巨作槽位。

All land units ignore [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement penalty from Forest and Jungle. +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +1 [ICON_FAITH] from each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact, and Sculpture [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Art in addition to the usual [ICON_Culture] Culture. Receive 100% more [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points. Palace has slots for 5 Great Works.
[ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡提供科技的90%的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。每回合的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值-50%。
[ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas provide 90% of the [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for technologies. -50% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science per turn.
在淡水和海岸旁定居时不提供额外 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房。但农场提供额外+1 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房和+1 [ICON_GOLD] 金币，且每与一座天文台相邻则+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。每有一个奢侈品与市中心相邻，则+1 [ICON_AMENITIES] 宜居度。

Settling adjacent to Fresh Water and Coast does not provide extra [ICON_HOUSING] Housing, instead each Farm provides an additional +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing, +1 [ICON_Production] Production for every adjacent Observatory, and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Luxury adjacent to the City Center.
[ICON_Capital] 首都6个单元格范围内城市所有产出+10%，且建成时将获得1名建造者。[ICON_Capital] 首都9个单元格范围内6个单元格外的的非首都城市所有产出不变。其他非首都城市所有产出-15%。[ICON_Capital] 首都6个单元格范围内的单位+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +10% to all yields, and when founded receive a builder. Non capital cities within 9 tiles and outside 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital yields remain usual. Other non capital cities receive -15% to all yields. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to units within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.
所有城市建立时赠送纪念碑。[NEWLINE]建造市中心建筑时加速25%。
All cities start with a Monument building. +25% Construction speed towads builings in the City Center.

游戏初始便解锁“航海术”与“造船术”科技，同时拥有进入海洋单元格的能力。水运单位+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。未改良的树林与雨林提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。“重商主义”额外提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、+“行政部门”额外提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、“保护地球”额外+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。渔船提供+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物，并向相邻单元格投放文化炸弹。无法获得 [ICON_GreatWriter] 大作家。

Begin the game with the Sailing and Shipbuilding technologies unlocked and with the ability to enter Ocean tiles. Embarked units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Unimproved Woods and Rainforest are +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Additional +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Mercantilism ,+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Civil Service and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Conservation. Fishing Boats provide +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and a Culture Bomb to adjacent tiles. [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers cannot be earned.
起始城市中的每个沙漠平原单元格为所有[ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供+1 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。文明每次进入黄金时代后可获得永久+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。
All [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every flat Desert tile in the origin city. Receive +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Capacity every time you enter a Golden Age.

解锁建造者建造埃及特色狮身人面像的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值、+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。+2魅力。如果与奇观相邻，+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。如建在泛滥平原上，+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。每个相邻的狮身人面像为相邻的建造在泛滥平原上的农场+1 [ICON_FOOD]食物。获得“自然历史”市政后将产出更多 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。[NEWLINE] 研究完“飞行”后其将提供 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。无法建在另一个狮身人面像旁。无法建在雪地或雪地丘陵上。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Sphinx, unique to Egypt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +2 Appeal. +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith if next to a wonder. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture if built on Floodplains. Each Sphinx +1 [Icon_food] Food to adjacent Farm if the Farm is built on Floodplains. [NEWLINE] Additional [ICON_CULTURE] Culture once Natural History is discovered. Provides [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after researching Flight. Cannot be built next to another Sphinx. Cannot be built on Snow or Snow Hills.
在江河旁建造区域与奇观时 [ICON_Production] 生产力+15%。不会受到洪水的损害。每次完成一个奇观，获得一个免费的建造者。

+15% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts and wonders if placed next to a River. Does not receive damage from Floods. Each time after finishing consturcting a wonder, receive a free Builder unit.
您通往其他文明的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线为埃及+8 [ICON_Gold] 金币。其他文明通往埃及的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线能为其+4 [ICON_Food] 食物、为埃及+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。与盟友进行贸易可获得三倍同盟点数。

Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to other civilizations provide +8 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt. Other civilizations' [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to Egypt provide +4 [ICON_Food] Food for them and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt. Trading with Allies earns triple as many bonus Alliance Points.
当倒数第二个 [ICON_GreatProphet] 预言家被招募后（如果您尚未获得 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家），自动获得最后一个大预言家。每座信奉阿拉伯宗教的外国城市+4 [ICON_Science] 科技值。

Automatically receive the final [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet already). +4 [ICON_Science] Science for each foreign city following Arabia's Religion.
获得等同于建在丘陵上的城市所产生 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值15%的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值和 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。单位在丘陵上时+4 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力。
Receive [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 15% of your [ICON_FAITH] Faith generation in cities founded on Hills. Units receive +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength on Hills.
所有区域（除市中心外）不移除树林、雨林、沼泽地貌。建在这些区域中的建筑以及区域本体和奇观将获得以下收益：建在树林上提供+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力、建在雨林上提供+2 [ICON_Food] 食物、建在沼泽上提供+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值。拥有“中世纪集市”市政后即可栽种树林。

All districts do not remove Forest, Rainforest and Marsh. Receive the following yields for every building and Districts itself on these features: +2 [ICON_Production] Production in Forest, +2 [ICON_Food] Food in Rainforest and +2 [ICON_Science] in Marsh. Woods can be planted with the Medieval Faires civic.
矿山为所有区域提供少量相邻加成、对无主领土施放文化炸弹，并+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。特色区域与其他区域相邻时不会获得少量相邻加成。

Mines provide a minor adjacency bonus for all districts, a Culture Bomb of unowned territory, and receive +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Specialty districts do not receive a minor adjacency for being adjacent to another district.
游戏开始便激活“写作”科技 [ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡和“对外贸易”市政 [ICON_CivicBoosted] 鼓舞。腓尼基建造的海岸城市若与 [ICON_Capital] 首都在同一大陆，则其忠诚度为100%。开拓者上船后，[ICON_Movement] 移动力与视野范围各+2。开拓者上船和下船无需额外花费 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。

Begin the game with the Writing technology [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and Foreign Trade [ICON_CivicBoosted] Boost. Coastal cities founded by Phoenicia and located on the same continent as the Phoenician [ICON_Capital] Capital are 100% Loyal. Settlers gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +2 sight range while embarked. Settlers ignore additional [ICON_Movement] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking.
[ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡和 [ICON_CivicBoosted] 鼓舞提升45%的科技和市政，而非35%。建成奇观时将获得奇观所处时代的一项随机 [ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡和 [ICON_CivicBoosted] 鼓舞（如可用）。

[ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations provide 45% of civics and technologies instead of 35%. When completing a wonder receive a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration from the era of the wonder, if available.
中国中世纪特色单位。 [ICON_Movement] 移动力为1但 [ICON_Range] 射程为3的高战斗力远程单位。
Chinese unique Medieval era unit. Ranged unit with a [ICON_Range] Range of 3 and high combat strength but have [ICON_Movement] Movement of 1 .
征集单位+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力、+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。升级征集单位所花费的 [ICON_GOLD] 金币和资源减少50%。征集城邦军队时可在该城邦增加2名 [ICON_ENVOY] 使者。研究“城堡”科技后获得特色单位“黑军”。

Levied units gain an ability giving them +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. It costs 50% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold and resources to upgrade Levied units. If you Levy troops from a City-State receive 2 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys with that City-State. Gain the Black Army unique unit when the Castles technology is researched.
拥有“政治哲学”市政后，[ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量+1，获得1次 [ICON_Governor] 总督升级。本国城市之间的路线+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币，+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。本国领土中的道路提升一个等级。

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity with Political Philosophy civic, gain 1 [ICON_Governor] Governor promotion. Receive +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture for routes between your own cities. Roads built in your territory are one level more advanced than usual.
对主要文明宣布突袭战争后的10回合内+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。拥有驻扎单位的城市每回合的忠诚度+5。宣布突袭战争的 [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] 不满和好战性与正式战争相同。

+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for the first 10 turns after declaring a Surprise War on a major civilization. +5 Loyalty per turn in cities with a garrisoned unit. Declaring a Surprise War only counts as a Formal War for the purposes of [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances and warmongering.
幸福度为快乐的城市额外+10% [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。快乐的城市中每个学院+2 [ICON_GreatScientist] 大科学家点数、每个工业区+2 [ICON_GreatEngineer] 大工程师点数。欣喜若狂的城市获得的加成将加倍。

Happy cities receive an additional +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Happy cities generate +2 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point per Campus and +2 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point per Industrial Zone. Ecstatic cities double all these amounts.
解锁建造者建造马普切木人（马普切特色改良设施）的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [Icon_Production] 生产力。提供等同于所在单元格魅力100%的 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。研究完“飞行”后可获得额外 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。要求单元格至少达到迷人魅力。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Chemamull, unique to Mapuche.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [Icon_Production] Production. Provides [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 100% of the tile's Appeal. Additional [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after researching Flight. Minimum Appeal of Charming.
宣布保卫城邦战争后的10回合内+100% [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。战斗胜利后，获得等同于被击杀单位战斗力100%的 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值（标准速度下）。如城邦的主流宗教与本方相同，则派遣至其处的每名 [ICON_ENVOY] 使者将视为2名（必须拥有1个主流宗教）。

+100% [ICON_FAITH] Faith for 10 turns after declaring a Protectorate War. Combat victories provide [ICON_FAITH] Faith equal to 100% of the Combat Strength of the defeated unit (on Standard Speed). Each [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy you send to a city-state of your majority Religion counts as two [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys. (Must have a majority Religion).
格鲁吉亚特色建筑。[ICON_Production] 生产力花费低于比文艺复兴城墙，并拥有更强的外部防御力。获得“保护地球”市政后提供+5点 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。提供+4 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。进入黄金时代后 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩与 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值均+300%。

A building unique to Georgia. Lower [ICON_Production] Production cost and higher outer defenses than Renaissance Walls. Provides +5 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after advancing to the Conservation Civic. Provides +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith. When in a Golden Age the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and [ICON_FAITH] Faith are +300%.

解锁建造者建造印加特色设施印加梯田的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物；每块印加梯田+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。每个相邻的山脉单元格+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物，解锁工程科技后，每个相邻的山脉单元格额外+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物。每个相邻的水渠区域+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。与淡水资源（非水渠区域）相邻时，+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力（无法相互叠加）。随着市政与科技的发展，与其他印加梯田相邻时还可额外获得 [ICON_FOOD] 食物加成。可建在草原丘陵、平原丘陵与沙漠丘陵上。
公民可在山脉单元格上工作。山脉单元格提供+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。每个相邻的梯田农场为山脉单元格+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物。解锁建造科技后，每个相邻的梯田农场为山脉单元格+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
所有陆地单位无视丘陵对 [ICON_MOVEMENT] 移动力的减益。起始城市中的每座山脉单元格为国内 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。解锁“对外贸易”市政后可获得印加路网改良设施。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Terrace Farm, unique to the Inca.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food. Provides +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing for every Terrace Farms. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each adjacent Mountain Tile ,+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food after researching Engineeing. Gain +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each adjacent Aqueduct district. Receive +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if adjacent to Fresh Water and not an Aqueduct district. Additional [ICON_FOOD] Food as you advance through the Civics and Technology Tree for adjacency with other Terrace Farms. Can be placed on Grassland Hills, Plains Hills, and Desert Hills.

Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food to Mountain tiles for every adjacent Terrace Farm. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production after researching Construntion.

All land units ignore [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement penalty from Hills. Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food for every Mountain tile in the origin city. Gain the Qhapaq Ñan improvement when Foreign Trade civic is discovered.

雨林单元格为学院、商业中心、圣地和剧院广场区域提供+1相邻加成，并为相邻的单元格提供+1魅力（而非通常的-1。）伐木场为相邻工业区提供+1相邻加成。若相邻工业区，雨林单元格 +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。建造在雨林的伐木场 +2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化。研究科技“飞行”后，将产出等同于 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化产出的 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。所有区域不移除雨林。若市中心相邻雨林，+1 [Icon_Faith] 信仰值。

Rainforest tiles provide +1 adjacency bonus for Campus, Commercial Hub, Holy Site, and Theater Square districts, and grant +1 Appeal to adjacent tiles, instead of the usual -1. Lumber Mill provides +1 adjacency bonus for Industrial Zone. Rainforest tiles receive +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if is adjacent to Industrial Zone tiles. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] for all Rainforest Lumber Mill. After researching Flight, Lumer Mill will provide [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture yields. All districts will not remove Rainforest. +1 [Icon_Faith] Faith if city is adjacent to Rainforest tiles.

After recruiting or patronizing a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person, 20% of its [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point cost is refunded. +1 [Icon_Faith] Faith in all Rainforest Tiles across your country for every two [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person you have recruited.
招募或赞助一位 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人后，将返还所消耗 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数的20%。每招募2名伟人，您国境内的所有雨林单元格+1 [Icon_Faith] 信仰值。

Poland's majority religion becomes the dominant religion in cities that loses a tile to a Polish Culture Bomb. Holy Sites gain standard Faith adjacency bonus instead of minor adjacency bonus. All Relics provide bonus Faith (+2), Culture (+2) and Gold (+4).
如城市在波兰文化炸弹的攻击下失去单元格，则波兰的主流宗教将成为此城的主流宗教。圣地从其他区域获得标准相邻加成而不是少量相邻加成。所有遗物均提供加成：+2信仰值、+2文化值、+4金币。
解锁建造者建造斯基泰特色坟墩的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值、+3 [ICON_Gold] 金币。每与一座牧场相邻便+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值（研究完“马镫”后提升为+2）。研究完“飞行”之后将根据 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值提供 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。不能建在丘陵上。

解锁建造者建造法国特色建筑法国城堡的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值、+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。+1魅力。每与一座奇观相邻便+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值（研究“飞行”科技后提升为+2）。如处在包含河岸的单元格上，则+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。研究完“飞行”之后，将根据 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值提供 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。必须建在加成或奢侈品资源旁。无法建在另一座法国城堡旁。

随“砌砖”科技解锁的改良设施。可以建造在沙漠泛滥平原，沙漠、草原、平原（包括对应丘陵）上。+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值、+1 [ICON_Food] 食物，解锁神学后，+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。可从相邻区域获得额外产出。与市中心相邻则+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。如与提供相邻加成的其他任意区域相邻，则相应产出+1。建造在沙漠或者沙漠丘陵上时，额外+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值、+2 [ICON_Food] 食物。

Improvement that unlocks with Masonry and can be built on Desert Floodplains, Desert, Plains, Grass (including Hills). +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_Food] Food. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food after researching Theology. Receives additional yields from adjacent districts. +1 [ICON_Food] Food if adjacent to a city center. For all other districts that award adjacency bonuses: +1 of the appropriate yield if that district is adjacent. If build on Desert, Desert Hills extra +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +2 [ICON_Food] Food.
生产远程单位时+30% [ICON_Production] 生产力。所有远程单位战斗经验值+50%。战略资源矿产提供+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。加成和奢侈品资源矿产提供+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币；城市中每一种改良的战略矿产资源为城市+10% [ICON_Production] 生产力，每一种改良的加成或奢侈矿产资源为城市+10% [ICON_Gold] 金币。

[COLOR_RED]MISMATCHED TRANSLATION[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_TA_SETI_DESCRIPTION]+30% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ranged units. All Ranged units gain +30% combat experience. Mines over strategic resources provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production. Mines over bonus and luxury resources provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold, each kind of mines over bonus and luxury resources provide +10% [ICON_Gold] Gold.
